content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Fine art collections (Impressionist to Contemporary), Antiques & Furniture, IRS Estate Tax Appraisals, Insurance Documentation. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Team members: Edward Kitson, Elizabeth Lovett, Stephanie Calman; serves Charlotte metro area including Matthews, Concord, and Huntersville.
